channel.title: Obsidian on 千秋邈矣独留我；百战归来再读书。
channel.description: Recent content in Obsidian on 千秋邈矣独留我；百战归来再读书。

item.title: Home
item.author: dwowitness@gmail.com (Soryuwu Asuka)
item.description:
ᕦʕ •ᴥ•ʔᕤ Bear Bear ~

Hi, I am now a postgraduate student in HUST.

I am glad to record my thoughts and reflections here, striding forward with determination amidst confusion and uncertainty.
item.content:encoded:
ᕦʕ •ᴥ•ʔᕤ Bear Bear ~

Hi, I am now a postgraduate student in HUST.

I am glad to record my thoughts and reflections here, striding forward with determination amidst confusion and uncertainty.

item.title: Writing in Obsidian and publish with hugo
item.author: dwowitness@gmail.com (Soryuwu Asuka)
item.description:
Hugo Version: Hugo v0.141.0 + extended + withdeploy
Obsidian Plugin: Hugo Publish

Made with Bear Cub

I have constructed new CSS according to my own requirements, with the specific configuration as follows:

  1/* basic style */
  2
  3:root {
  4
  5font-size: 62.5%; /* 10px */
  6
  7--color-dark: #181a20;
  8
  9--color-light: #fafafa;
 10
 11--color-primary: #1a8fe3;
 12
 13--bordercl: rebeccapurple;
 14
 15--size: 1rem;
 16
 17--spacing: calc(var(--size) * 1.5);
 18
 19}
 20
 21  
 22
 23body {
 24
 25background: var(--color-light);
 26
 27color: var(--color-dark);
 28
 29padding: 4rem;
 30
 31font-family: Avenir, 'Avenir Next LT Pro', Montserrat, Corbel, 'URW Gothic',
 32
 33source-sans-pro, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji",
 34
 35"Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji";
 36
 37font-size: calc(var(--size) * 1.8);
 38
 39line-height: 1.5;
 40
 41min-height: 80vh;
 42
 43max-width: 1600px;
 44
 45margin: 0 auto;
 46
 47word-wrap: break-word;
 48
 49}
 50
 51  
 52
 53/* header/main/footer/basic's style */
 54
 55header, main, footer {
 56
 57max-width: 70ch;
 58
 59margin-inline: auto;
 60
 61}
 62
 63  
 64
 65/* head style */
 66
 67header {
 68
 69padding-bottom: var(--spacing);
 70
 71}
 72
 73  
 74
 75nav a, a.blog-tags {
 76
 77margin-right: calc(var(--spacing) / 2);
 78
 79}
 80
 81a.blog-tags {
 82
 83line-height: 2;
 84
 85}
 86
 87  
 88
 89/* main style */
 90
 91main {
 92
 93padding-bottom: var(--spacing);
 94
 95}
 96
 97  
 98
 99/* footer style */
100
101footer {
102
103text-align: center;
104
105padding-top: var(--spacing);
106
107border-top: 0.4rem dotted var(--bordercl);
108
109}
110
111  
112
113/* word style */
114
115a {
116
117color: currentColor;
118
119text-decoration-color: var(--color-primary);
120
121text-decoration-thickness: 0.3ex;
122
123text-underline-offset: 0.3ex;
124
125}
126
127  
128
129a:hover {
130
131text-decoration-thickness: 0.4ex;
132
133background-color: var(--color-primary);
134
135}
136
137  
138
139img {
140
141display: block;
142
143max-width: 100%;
144
145height: auto;
146
147}
148
149  
150
151h1, h2, h3, h4 {
152
153font-weight: 700;
154
155line-height: 1.3;
156
157}
158
159  
160
161h1 {
162
163font-size: calc(var(--size) * 3.8);
164
165}
166
167h2 {
168
169font-size: calc(var(--size) * 3);
170
171}
172
173h3 {
174
175font-size: calc(var(--size) * 2.2);
176
177}
178
179h4, h5, h6 {
180
181font-size: calc(var(--size) * 1.4);
182
183}
184
185  
186
187ul, ol {
188
189padding-inline-start: var(--spacing);
190
191}
192
193li {
194
195margin-block-start: var(--spacing);
196
197}
198
199  
200
201blockquote {
202
203padding-inline-start: var(--spacing);
204
205border-inline-start: 0.2em solid;
206
207font-style: italic;
208
209max-width: 50ch;
210
211}
212
213  
214
215:is(h1, h2, h3, h4, blockquote) {
216
217margin-block-end: calc(var(--spacing) / 2);
218
219}
220
221:is(h1, h2, h3, h4) + * {
222
223margin-block-start: calc(var(--spacing) / 3);
224
225}
226
227:is(h1, h2, h3, h4) + :where(h2, h3, h4) {
228
229margin-block-start: calc(var(--spacing) * 2);
230
231}
232
233  
234
235.title {
236
237text-decoration: none;
238
239}
240
241.title h1 {
242
243font-size: calc(var(--size) * 3.4);
244
245margin-top: calc(var(--spacing) / 2);
246
247}
248
249  
250
251ul.blog-posts {
252
253list-style-type: none;
254
255padding: unset;
256
257}
258
259ul.blog-posts li {
260
261display: flex;
262
263flex-direction: column;
264
265}
266
267ul.blog-posts li span {
268
269min-width: 11ch;
270
271}
272
273  
274
275p.byline {
276
277opacity: 0.5;
278
279}
280
281  
282
283code {
284
285font-family: ui-monospace, 'Cascadia Code', 'Source Code Pro',
286
287Menlo, Consolas, 'DejaVu Sans Mono', monospace;
288
289padding: 2px calc(var(--spacing) / 4);
290
291background-color: #232323;
292
293color: #f8f8f8;
294
295font-size: calc(var(--size) * 1.4);
296
297}
298
299pre code {
300
301display: block;
302
303padding: var(--spacing);
304
305overflow-x: auto;
306
307-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
308
309-moz-text-size-adjust: 100%;
310
311}
312
313  
314
315table {
316
317width: 100%;
318
319}
320
321table,
322
323th,
324
325td {
326
327border: 1px solid;
328
329border-collapse: collapse;
330
331border-color: var(--color-dark);
332
333padding: calc(var(--spacing) / 2);
334
335}
336
337  
338
339.disabled {
340
341color: currentColor;
342
343cursor: not-allowed;
344
345opacity: 0.5;
346
347}
348
349  
350
351@media screen and (min-width: 600px) {
352
353ul.blog-posts li {
354
355flex-direction: row;
356
357gap: calc(var(--spacing) / 2);
358
359}
360
361}
362
363  
364
365/* "Skip to main content" link */
366
367.skip-link {
368
369position: absolute;
370
371top: 5;
372
373transform: translateY(-600%);
374
375transition: transform 0.5s;
376
377background-color: #181a20;
378
379padding: 6px;
380
381}
382
383  
384
385.skip-link:focus {
386
387transform: translateY(0%);
388
389}
390
391  
392
393figure {
394
395margin-inline-start: 0em;
396
397margin-inline-end: 0em;
398
399}
400
401  
402
403figcaption > p {
404
405margin-block-start: 9px;
406
407text-align: center;
408
409font-style: italic;
410
411}
